Title: AN ACT TO AMEND THE LAST ITEM OF THE SUBHEADING "VSUMMARY" OF THE APPROPRIATION FOR THE NATIONAL LIBRARY MADE IN COMMONWEALTH ACT NUMBERED TWO HUNDRED AND FORTY-FIVE SO AS TO MAKE THE PHRASE "LESSFORCE SAVINGS, FROM SALARIES AND WAGES" TO READ "LESSFORCED SAVINGS.(awÞhi("
Data:
[ Commonwealth Act No. 395, September 05, 1938 ]
AN ACT TO AMEND THE LAST ITEM OF THE SUBHEADING "VSUMMARY" OF THE APPROPRIATION FOR THE NATIONAL LIBRARY MADE IN COMMONWEALTH ACT NUMBERED TWO HUNDRED AND FORTY-FIVE SO AS TO MAKE THE PHRASE "LESSFORCE SAVINGS, FROM SALARIES AND WAGES" TO READ "LESSFORCED SAVINGS.(awÞhi("
Be it enacted by the National Assembly of the Philippines:
Section 1. The phrase "Less-forced savings from salaries and wages" appearing under subheading "V-Summary" of the appropriation for the National Library as provided in Commonwealth Act Numbered Two hundred and forty-five is hereby amended to read "Less-forced savings."
Section 2. This Act shall take effect as of January first, nine-teen hundred and thirty-eight.
Approved, September 5, 1938.
